1123047199066054656.text:
Speaking of open source.

Etiquette, whilst at the Bazaar

1. Respect licenses, properly attribute the libraries you benefit from. Originators spent countless R&D hrs you're getting for free
2. Salmon > tuna. Push features upstream instead of fork a repo=less maintainance
